Feature: Buying Currency Widget
Scenario Outline: Customers should be able to buy currency # BuyCurrency.feature:3 Given A webbroswer is at the travelex website When A customer choose country "<country>" from dropdown And Customer enter how much amount "<amount>" they like And Customer optin cash and clicks on Buy Cash And Customer enter postcode "<postcode>" and clikc on find store And Customer choose nearest location and choose date and click next And Customer enter "<title>" , "<firstname>" , "<lastname>" , "<phonenumber>" , "<addphonenumber>" , "<email>" , "<confirmemail>" ,
Examples:
Scenario Outline: Customers should be able to buy currency # BuyCurrency.feature:18 Given A webbroswer is at the travelex website # HomePageStepDefinitions.a_webbroswer_is_at_the_travelex_website() When A customer choose country "Euro - (EUR)" from dropdown # HomePageStepDefinitions.a_customer_choose_country_from_dropdown(String) And Customer enter how much amount "2000" they like # HomePageStepDefinitions.customer_enter_how_much_amount_they_like(String) And Customer optin cash and clicks on Buy Cash # HomePageStepDefinitions.customer_optin_cash_and_clicks_on_Buy_Cash() And Customer enter postcode "E12 6NU" and clikc on find store # MyOrderstepdefinitions.customer_enter_postcode_and_clikc_on_find_store(String) And Customer choose nearest location and choose date and click next # MyOrderstepdefinitions.customer_choose_nearest_location_and_choose_date_and_click_next() And Customer enter "Mr." , "test" , "testing" , "07809123456" , "07809123456" , "nn@gmail.com" , "nn@gmail.com" , # PaymentStepdefinitions.customer_enter(String,String,String,String,String,String,String)
Scenario Outline: Customers should be able to buy currency # BuyCurrency.feature:19 Given A webbroswer is at the travelex website # HomePageStepDefinitions.a_webbroswer_is_at_the_travelex_website() When A customer choose country "USA - U.S. Dollar (USD)" from dropdown # HomePageStepDefinitions.a_customer_choose_country_from_dropdown(String) And Customer enter how much amount "3000" they like # HomePageStepDefinitions.customer_enter_how_much_amount_they_like(String) And Customer optin cash and clicks on Buy Cash # HomePageStepDefinitions.customer_optin_cash_and_clicks_on_Buy_Cash() And Customer enter postcode "E12 6NU" and clikc on find store # MyOrderstepdefinitions.customer_enter_postcode_and_clikc_on_find_store(String) And Customer choose nearest location and choose date and click next # MyOrderstepdefinitions.customer_choose_nearest_location_and_choose_date_and_click_next() And Customer enter "Miss." , "test" , "testing" , "07809123456" , "07809123456" , "nn@gmail.com" , "nn@gmail.com" , # PaymentStepdefinitions.customer_enter(String,String,String,String,String,String,String)
